display_long_description:
Welcome to Big White Room. A place with no color... just endless white space and a whole lot of satisfyingly realistic physics objects. Your goal? Experiment, build, interact, and maybe find a way out.

This isn't about complex riddles; it's a hands-on VR physics playground. Get creative with our awesome physics engine – stack crates impossibly high, build wobbly towers, send spheres flying, and see how things satisfyingly tumble and crash. Feel the realistic weight and motion as you manipulate objects in immersive VR.

And yeah, you're not entirely alone. Odd figures watch your every move. Feel free to give 'em a good smack if they're creeping you out – the physics makes it surprisingly fun!

Unleash your creativity and just have fun messing around with physics in Big White Room. See what you can build, what you can break!

Features:

Engaging VR physics sandbox set in a stark, minimalist white world.
Highly realistic and fun physics engine – perfect for experimenting and creative play.
Build, stack, toss, and manipulate objects with intuitive VR controls.
Encounter strange, smackable watchers.
Discover emergent ways to play and interact within the environment.
